item.title: Tutorial 4 - One GUI to rule them all
item.description: Hello there! We got to the final chapter of our PraxisLIVE basic series (excluding the extra chapter)! Today we’ll explore the GUI patch, which you might find very useful if you are going to show your work at a live event. The title, a semi-quote from “The Lord of the Rings”, sums what GUI do: it allows you to control live parameters all in one screen very quickly, without switching between all the nodes.
